title.abbrev: RPKI States as BGP Communities Harmful

front.title: Grouping RPKI Origin Validation states as BGP Communities Considered Harmful

abstract.t: When RPKI Validation States are grouped as BGP communities, events such as expiration of Certificates or accidental termination of all RPKI-RTR sessions, cause needless BGP UPDATE messages to be flooded through the global Internet routing system. The practise of grouping Resource Public Key Infrastructure (RPKI) Origin Validation states as Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) Communities is considered harmful.
